content: यत्नः [यत्-भावे नङ्] {@--1@} An effort, exertion, attempt, endeavour, trial; यत्ने कृते यदि न सिध्यति कोऽत्र दोषः <ls>H. Pr. 31</ls>; <ls>Bh. 2. 5.</ls> {@--2@} Diligence, assiduity, perseverance. {@--3@} Care, zeal, watchfulness, vigilance; महान्हि यत्नस्तव देवदारौ <ls>R. 2. 56</ls>; प्रतिपात्रमाधीयतां यत्नः <ls>Ś. 1.</ls> {@--4@} Pains, trouble, labour, difficulty; शेषांगनिर्माणविधौ विधातुर्लावण्य उत्पाद्य इवास यत्नः <ls>Ku. 1. 35</ls>, <ls n="Ku.">7. 66</ls>; <ls>R. 7. 14.</ls> (यत्नेन {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} with great effort, diligently, carefully. यत्नतः carefully, zealously, sedulously; <ls>Bh. 2. 99.</ls> यत्नात् {1} with great effort. {2} diligently, vigorously, zealously. {3} in spite of every effort. {4} necessarily.).
